name: Natalie Gittleson
text:
Employee servive was nice. And idd say top notch.
Very few people in there people need to start supporting it more.
I thought the pizza was great. :)

name: david rios
text:
Really good. Pizza is always on time.
And the staff are really nice and helpful

name: Cynthia Curtis
text: I haven't had issues with the food or my order being wrong. I do have issues with them no longer taking online orders. My apartment is a cell phone dead zone thus ordering online directly from the store works. Now having to go through doordash is not only cost prohibited  it's impossible to use when paying cash.

name: Rachael Jones
text: Consistent flavors. However garlic knots and pizza were very well done, and they forgot to cut our big cookie.

name: Scott Dabbs
text: The waitress was nice & it seemed like she was trying to do her best. I have a feeling she was not properly trained. Music coming from kitchen was loud and inappropriate. The staff gathered in between the front of the house & back. The …More

name: Hasnain Attarwala
text: Great for a pizza hut. The employees here do the best they can, but the chain itself sucks.

name: Bryan Ferguson
text: Same quality you expect with any pizza hut.

name: G P
text: If you like only olives and sausage, barely any at that, on your pizza this place is for you. The buffet is small, has no choices, and is never restocked.  If you like pasta, order it.  Waited 30 minutes and was never replenished at the …More

name: Ginger Chesnutt-Ardelean
text: My adopted brother worked at Saint Charles Pizza Hut when I was a kid and I liked the bread sticks I believe Neal still works for Pizza Hut lol

name: Natalie Gittleson
text: Yummy . great deal s

name: Ryan Foelske
text: Always has some good deals. Order usually done on-time. Lunch buffet is fun.

name: Kate Fuglestad
text: Great pizza for a chain place. Just be sure to order stuff on sale. When things are regular price, it is overpriced.

name: Frank Chasteen
text: Had buffet,  good selection of pizza. Better go in there for the lunch buffet while you can,  June - July this location will be closing for remodel and will be a carry out location only

name: pablo silva
text: Shame they stopped doing dining in so early in the day

name: Jay N
text: I go for the lunch buffet. Service is decent and the pizza is.. well, pizza. If you catch them at a busy time they will probably be understaffed so ration your drink.

name: Active Sloth
text: They deserve a 5 for the music

name: Mayur Patel
text:
Stupid Pizza Hut in Dekalb
Dekalb people be careful Pizza Hut because he charged extra after delivery and employee don’t use gloves when making pizza I see face to face employee after bathroom no wash hands what you think Dekalb people buy Pizza Hut or not

name: Rodney Weber
text: Typical pizza place. My order was messed up when I went to pick it up, I had to wait until they recooked there entire order

name: Andrew Kellogg
text: Pizza Hut will always have good pizza with some deals. I very much enjoy their lunch buffet

name: Lorie Lewis
text: Food was good people were very nice was happy to see a sit in pizza hut

name: Sarabjeet Singh
text: Dominos has better pizza.

name: James Edwards
text: Very Good Very Tasty too Good Job!

name: Tenille Rogers
text: I had the worst experience ever the was a young guy with reddish/ blonde hair with freckles if he is still working there I would recommend not to eat there also another employee heavy set guy short hair ! They burnt my pizza and breadsticks …More

name: Ore Akinbo
text: Good food and great employees who put up with a party of 30+ at once

name: Thomas Head
text: They have trouble with orders sometimes, either being out of things, or forgetting to put items in. The food is usually cooked well.

name: Dani
text: The Pizza Hut app would not process my order, so I tried to call it in. The woman on the phone said I wouldn't get the discounts without the app or a physical coupon. I explained I was having trouble with the app, so she agreed to give me the discounted cost. When my husband picked up the food, he was charged full price!

name: Ivette Flores
text: When placed a order to pick up was 10 minutes the wait, really fast!

name: rachel diaz
text: It was fast service and the food was delicious.

name: MANOJ VARMA
text:
I am not able to give any lower rating than 1 star
Here goes my  terrible experience ever with pizza hut:
I ordered a two toppings large pizza for pickup and it was paid and picked up by …More

name: Princess Willy
text: The buffet is okay, but a little understaffed. The food's generally pretty bad though; I mean it's Pizza Hut, why would you go here? Vinny's down the street is the same prices, but actually tastes like food.

name: sunanda pssm
text: 5$ menu is really good and heavy lunch or dinner for 3 people.  But I hope they can ask atleast 3 toppings on pizza instead of one topping

name: Deblina Das
text: The server was very good but the food was not.

name: Elizabeth smith
text: Every time I have come to this establishment it has been horrible service. I have only been here during lunch, which then I eat the buffet. That means there shouldn't be much service needed, right? I am never given silverware, I have to ask …More

name: Amy Burr
text: Placed an order, was charged twice and never recieved the order. Manager then hung up on me when I called.

name: Kelli Hamilton
text: I love pizza hut!

name: Ivan Starkey
text: Great pizza and very fast service

name: Candice Truman
text: The Italian meatball pizza is gross..the meatballs aren't even real meat and the seasoning tastes like musk... pizza hut, seriously?!!

name: Josephine Agbemafle
text: Quick service

name: DaRue Smith
text: Terrible customer service

text: Ok for friday snack after you are drunk

Zero Stars.

They forgot a part of my order, said they would refund it and never did.

Avoid.
